bike.description: D6 high modulus carbon, integrated head tube w/ 1 1/2" lower, internal cable routing, oversized PIIS BB-86 shell, double water bottle mounts. Rear triangle: D6 high modulus carbon thin seat stays, oversized ETC chainstay, forged alloy dropout w/ replaceable hanger

components.description: FC-330 carbon monocoque w/ tapered carbon steerer & carbon dropout
Rotor Press-Fit BB86/30 sealed cartridge bearing
Shimano Dura Ace STI shifter/brake, 20-speed Flight Deck compatible
Oval 535 aero alloy, 35mm rims, DT Swiss Competition spokes, 20/24H, sealed bearing hubs
Oval 700 forged & CNC'd w/ cartridge pads
Oval 1 1/8"U - 1 1/2"L integrated w/ alloy top cover
Oval 910 full carbon w/ ergo drops, 31.8mm
Selle Italia SL Kit Carbonio w/ tubular manganese rails
